content.question: Based on an analysis of the data in Figure 2, describe the activity pattern of the mice during the light and dark periods of the L12:D12 cycle.

frqParts.text: Based on an analysis of the data in Figure 2, describe the activity pattern of the mice during the light and dark periods of the L12:D12 cycle.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
